column4: What might cause a "timeout" at boot and a busybox prompt to come up?
USB key, external drive, after that the suggestions get more and more scary.
I've just setup a raid0/lvm system.  I can mount it all when I boot to my old drive and the system seems properly installed.  I duplicated the setup on a VM and it booted fine.
Sounds like lvm might not be loading properly - but I don't boot RAID or lvm so I won't mess you about with any more 'mights'. Sorry!
